is a small city in the
Roha has a population of about 90,000 and is centre for chemical manufacturing.

Roha can be reached by Railways Or Roads.

The nearest Internation Airport is Mumbai.

Dhavir Temple. Dhavir Maharaj is the prime deity of Roha. Every year the town celebrates Navaratri Festival by having a 10 day Festival at the Dhavir Temple which ends on the 10th day - "Dasra" during Navaratri. On the following day of Dasra, Palkhi of Dhavir Maharaj is taken through the town where it visits each and every house for the Aarti.
